channel.title: Quest Coding Problem
channel.description:
Hello, I'm not very good at coding and heres my code, can you please fix this for me :confused: thanks - Paulpkyou
[code]if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1) [/code]
P.s. i'm sure i'm way off O.o
EDIT: "client.java:15379: illegal start of expression if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1) ^ client.java:15379: not a statement if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1) ^ client.java:15379: ';' expected if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1) ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . ." That is exactly what it says when i compile

item.title: Quest Coding Problem
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

try the following code. it will work.
(the error was right infront of your face the whole time…)

if((absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1)

this:
if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1)
^
Meant close the “if” statement, therefore, the && absY part was considered as an error…

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Coding Problem
item.dc:creator: @dontreadthis dontreadthis
item.description:
@dontreadthis wrote:

wats the erros lol.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2008, 09:09:52 pm[/size][hr](absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1)

In your server, is that how the coords are in the other methods…and whaat source are you using?

If not, try to switch q4stage >=1 around with teh coords…

item.title: Quest Coding Problem
item.dc:creator: @paulpkyou paulpkyou
item.description:
@paulpkyou wrote:

Hello, I’m not very good at coding and heres my code, can you please fix this for me thanks - Paulpkyou

if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1)

P.s. i’m sure i’m way off O.o

EDIT: “client.java:15379: illegal start of expression
if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1)
^
client.java:15379: not a statement
if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1)
^
client.java:15379: ‘;’ expected
if(absX == 3234) && (absY == 3203) && q4stage >= 1)
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .” That is exactly what it says when i compile
